resources.string: Monitor not supported with supplied preferences
Timed out waiting for service to start.
Could not acquire root access. Make sure your devices is rooted and you permitted root access for this application.
/sys/class/thermal does not exist. This application may not work on your device. Try enabling root, if available.
No valid thermal zones are enabled.
Couldn\'t read thermal zones using root. This application may not work on your device.
Can\'t read type of a thermal zone. This application may not work on your device. Try enabling root, if available.
Can\'t read type of a thermal zone. This application may not work on your device.
Can\'t read temp of a thermal zone. This application may not work on your device. Try enabling root, if available.
Can\'t read temp of a thermal zone. This application may not work on your device.
No root IPC object passed to monitor (root globally disabled?).
Monitor configuration invalid. Please try to reset the application.
Can\'t read frequency of a CPU.
Enable root globally first to use this feature.
No thermal zones found. This application may not work on your device. Try enabling root, if available.
No thermal zones found. This application may not work on your device.
Thermal monitor not supported with current configuration
CPU frequency monitor not supported with current configuration
The module seems to be working correctly on this device using the current settings.

This application allows you to monitor the temperature of your device as you're using it.

This wizard will guide you through the steps required to setup this application on your device.

Please keep in mind, that this application relies on the manufacturers support of exposing the component temperatures, thus it may not work on every device. On some devices root access is required.
Overlay permission not enabled, open overlay settings to enable.

For the application to work, you need to enable a special permission, allowing this application to draw overlays over other applications. Press the button below to open the Android system dialog where you can enable this setting.

For security, older versions of Android might disable some features while the overlay is running. For example it might not be possible to install an application from an external source (the install button will not work). To fix this, it is enough to stop the service of this application while these features are required.
Used for the required persistent notification of the service.
This Android system level setting needs to be enabled before the app is allowed to draw the overlay.
Check the compatibility of this module with the current settings.
Choose the refresh interval to use in milliseconds.
Use root to access thermal zones
Choose the temperature scale to use.
Select the thermal zones to monitor.
Choose the position of the overlay to appear in.
Choose the background color and the transparency of the overlay.
Choose the text color to use on the overlay.
Choose the size of the text to use on the overlay.
Choose the width used for the labels in the overlay.
